channel.title: Client class Error

item.title: Client class Error
item.dc:creator: @Liquid_Magic Liquid Magic
item.description:
@Liquid_Magic wrote:

[quote=“C4ll3r, post:1, topic:376726”] if(playerRights == 0 && starter == 0); { // When logon first time message sM("Welcome to ScapeRun"); sM("Enter ::new for some Rules, Tips and more"); } [b]else if[/b] (starter == 1); { // When logon second and other times message sM("Welcome back to ScapeRun"); }

When i compile this in my client.java it says Else without if but im sure i got the else if statement soo whats the problem[/quote]
Replace it with this…

if((playerRights == 0) && (starter == 0))
{
    sM("Welcome to ScapeRun");
    sM("Enter ::new for some Rules, Tips and more"); 
}
else if(starter == 1)
{
    sM("Welcome back to ScapeRun");
}

Read full topic
